DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: Bell Atlantic , Nynex Seek Cellular Merger : The two big East Coast telephone_companies are expected to announce today a plan to merge their wireless communications businesses.If approved by regulators , the deal would result in the creation of the nation ' s second-largest cellular_phone company and would help the two companies challenge AT & T and MCI for nationwide leadership in wireless communications . AT & T is seeking to acquire McCaw Cellular , the nation ' s largest cellular firm , while MCI has allied_with Nextel Communications , which owns valuable wireless licenses . The Bell Atlantic-Nynex deal also marks the first time that any of the regional Bell operating companies created by the breakup of AT & T have sought a major alliance with one another .
